title: Carla Walker // 168
description:
When a young Texas couple was attacked in their car after a high school Valentine’s Day dance, the teenage girl was abducted. And after her body was discovered days later, an investigation into her murder began. But it wasn’t until new DNA technology brought real answers to the case. This is the story of Carla Walker.
BONUS EPISODES
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
